NK015(ba)007:0: pra ga t+aa khata&a&a&a ng+ga s+ya sh+ai r+sha ma //
NK015(ba)007:2: / sngon 'gro yan lag brgyad pa'i dabu'o //
NK015(ba)007:3: rnal 'byor pas rgyun du bshags pa bya ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:4: rang nyid lhar gsal ba'i thugs khar nyi zla'i ga'u kha sbyor gnas pa'i nang du /
NK015(ba)007:5: sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge h'u dkar po gcig bsam /
NK015(ba)007:6: de las 'od du byung srog dag pa'i lam du zhugs /
NK015(ba)007:7: rang gi lte ba'i 'og nas rtsa ro ma rkyang
NK015(ba)007:8: ma kun d+har ma dang gsum yod pa shad kyi
NK015(ba)007:9: tshangs bug tu sleb pa'i nang du 'od byung bas
NK015(ba)007:10: / spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu ga nas 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas /
NK015(ba)007:11: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi sku la gzugs kyi skur bzhengs nas /
NK015(ba)007:12: de yang zhi khro phur gsum gyi lha tshogs gyur nas /
NK015(ba)007:13: mdun gyii nam mkhar spyan drangs /
NK015(ba)007:14: nyi zla pad+ma gsum brtsegs kyi steng na zhal ram mer bzhugs par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:15: gtso bo'i dbu la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
NK015(ba)007:16: rdo rje slob dpon la brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams
NK015(ba)007:17: rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs su byas nas dbu
NK015(ba)007:18: rgyan gyi tshul du bzhugs par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:21: thugs kyis dgongs nas bzhugs pa la /
NK015(ba)007:23: d+hu pe push+pe a lo ke gan+d+he nee w+aid+ya shap+da +aahmh'u /
NK015(ba)007:25: rang lus dpag tu med par sprul nas /
NK015(ba)007:26: lus ngag yid gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal bar bsam /
NK015(ba)007:27: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK015(ba)007:28: sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo nyid //
NK015(ba)007:29: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi //
NK015(ba)007:30: bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:31: bla ma bshes gnyen dam pa khyed //
NK015(ba)007:32: bdag cag rnams kyi pha lags so //
NK015(ba)007:33: bdag cag rnams kyi ma lags so //
NK015(ba)007:34: bdag cag rnams kyi mgon lags so //
NK015(ba)007:35: bdag cag rnams kyi ston pa lags //
NK015(ba)007:36: bdag cag rnams kyi 'dren pa lags //
NK015(ba)007:37: mun pa sel ba'i sgron me lags //
NK015(ba)007:38: dug gsum nad sel sman pa lags /
NK015(ba)007:40: / 'gro ba sgrol ba'i gru lags so //
NK015(ba)007:41: nyi ma'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:42: zla ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:44: nam mkha'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:45: yon tan re ba skong phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:46: phrin las kun sgrol phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:47: des bskyed dus gsum sangs rgyas dang //
NK015(ba)007:48: dam chos rgyu 'bras ma lus dang //
NK015(ba)007:49: rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang //
NK015(ba)007:51: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag /
NK015(ba)007:52: ye shes rgya mtsho rab zab thugs //
NK015(ba)007:54: nor bu rin chen yon tan mdzod //
NK015(ba)007:55: rdo rje'i yid la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:56: thams cad ngo bo mnyam nyid sku //
NK015(ba)007:57: bde chen gar dbang sku gsung thugs //
NK015(ba)007:58: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yi //
NK015(ba)007:59: he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:60: de ni spyan drangs pa dang /
NK015(ba)007:61: phyag 'tshal ba'i yan lag ste dang po'o //
NK015(ba)007:63: kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa gzugs sdug pa /
NK015(ba)007:67: reg bya 'jam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pas phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad khyad par spros pas /
NK015(ba)007:68: nam mkha' la sprin bzhin du 'khrigs pa /
NK015(ba)007:69: bar snang la char bzhin du bab pa /
NK015(ba)007:70: sa gzhi la rtsi shing bzhin du skyes pa mchod par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:71: gzhan yang phyi'i lha mo bzhi /
NK015(ba)007:80: gar ma rnams kyis mchod par bsam la /
NK015(ba)007:81: bde bar gshegs so bcom ldan 'das //
NK015(ba)007:82: rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes kyi //
NK015(ba)007:83: srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kyi //
NK015(ba)007:84: spyod pa rgya mtsho rmad byung kun //
NK015(ba)007:85: kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol //
NK015(ba)007:86: na mahsarba ta th+aa ga te b+h+yo b+hi shwa mu khe b+h+ya /
NK015(ba)007:87: sarba ta da kham uta ga te /
NK015(ba)007:88: s+pha ra na i mam ga ga na kham s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)007:90: rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:91: dam tshig chen po dam pa grub par mdzod //
NK015(ba)007:94: rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:95: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig grub par mdzod //
NK015(ba)007:98: rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:99: mchod pa chen po dga' ba dag par mdzod //
NK015(ba)007:100: badz+ra a lo ke grih+na h'u /
NK015(ba)007:102: rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:103: mchod pa chen po btang snyoms grub par mdzod //
NK015(ba)007:107: badz+ra g+hirti h+r+aih badz+ra nirti +aah de ni mchod pa'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o //
NK015(ba)007:108: de nas bshags pa bya ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:109: rang thal mo sbyar tsog pur bsdad la /
NK015(ba)007:110: rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan sngar phyin nas /
NK015(ba)007:111: rang gzhan gyi tshe rabs 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas /
NK015(ba)007:112: da lta la thug gi bar du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci byas pa /
NK015(ba)007:114: gzhan gyi byas pa la yi rang skyes pa /
NK015(ba)007:115: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig nyams chag thams cad dang /
NK015(ba)007:116: sdom pa gsum la chag nyams dang 'gal 'khrul du gyur pa thams cad zhe thag pa nas bshags /
NK015(ba)007:117: da phyin chad srog la bab kyang sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mi byed par bsam la /
NK015(ba)007:119: bdag gis tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas //
NK015(ba)007:120: da lta yan chad mi dge'i sdig spyad dang /
NK015(ba)007:122: / 'dul sdom zhig dang phyi nang dam nyams dang //
NK015(ba)007:123: khyad par nyon mongs bag med le lo yis //
NK015(ba)007:124: rtsa ba yan lag la sogs bsrung bya rnams //
NK015(ba)007:125: zhig ral nyams dang khyad bsad yal bar dor //
NK015(ba)007:126: gzhung du ma snyags gzhung 'gal che chung rnams //
NK015(ba)007:127: nyams dang tshor dang ma tshor nyams so 'tshal //
NK015(ba)007:128: rtsa ba yan lag zla zhar kun tu nyams //
NK015(ba)007:129: shin tu gnong zhing gdung bas bshags par bgyi //
NK015(ba)007:130: gnong 'gyod bshags pas tshangs pa stsal du gsol //
NK015(ba)007:131: ces pas rgyal ba rnams kyi dag pa tshangs pa'i gnang ba byin par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:132: bshags pa'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o //
NK015(ba)007:133: bzhi pa dge ba la yid rang ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:134: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phags pa nyan thos dang /
NK015(ba)007:136: 'jig rten dge 'dun dang gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi
NK015(ba)007:137: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dga' zhing rjes
NK015(ba)007:138: su yi rang bar bsam la /
NK015(ba)007:139: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
NK015(ba)007:141: / 'phags pa rnams dang so so'i skye bo yis //
NK015(ba)007:142: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa ma lus pa //
NK015(ba)007:143: rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo //
NK015(ba)007:144: rjes su yi rang ba'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o //
NK015(ba)007:145: lnga pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:146: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi bzhed pa rnams la /
NK015(ba)007:147: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can gyi don byed par zhu ba gsol bar bsam la /
NK015(ba)007:148: 'bras bu mngon gyur ring por ma lon par //
NK015(ba)007:149: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams na bzhugs so 'tshal /
NK015(ba)007:151: / 'gro rnams myur du sangs rgyas thob slad du //
NK015(ba)007:152: bla med chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul //
NK015(ba)007:153: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i yan lag ste lnga pa'o //
NK015(ba)007:154: drug pa mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs su gsol ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:155: sangs rgyas rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs pa rnams la /
NK015(ba)007:156: bdag gis mchod pa rnams kyis mchod de /
NK015(ba)007:157: 'khor ba ji srid mya ngan las mi 'da' bar
NK015(ba)007:158: bzhugs nas sems can gyi don mdzad par gsol ba
NK015(ba)007:160: gdul bya'i bya ba tshar ba'i thub pa rnams //
NK015(ba)007:161: chos kyi dbyings su 'da' bar bzhed pa la //
NK015(ba)007:162: ji srid 'khor ba stongs par ma gyur par //
NK015(ba)007:163: bzhugs nas mya ngan mi 'dar gsol ba 'debs //
NK015(ba)007:164: mya ngan las ni mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs pa'i yan lag ste drug pa'o //
NK015(ba)007:166: bdag gis tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas /
NK015(ba)007:167: da lta la thug gi bar du lus ngag yid
NK015(ba)007:168: gsum gyi sgo nas dkar po dge ba'i rtsa ba
NK015(ba)007:170: gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bgyis pa nas /
NK015(ba)007:171: bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad kyis /
NK015(ba)007:172: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyur bsngo'o snyam du bsam la /
NK015(ba)007:173: de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba ci byas pa thams
NK015(ba)007:174: cad byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya bsam la
NK015(ba)007:176: bdag gis tshe rabs thog ma med pa nas //
NK015(ba)007:177: da lta yan chad dge ba ci spyad dang //
NK015(ba)007:178: khyad par deng 'dir dge ba ci spyad pa //
NK015(ba)007:179: bdag gzhan don phyir byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK015(ba)007:180: de ni zhabs sdud bsngo ba dang bcas pa'i yan lag ste bdun pa'o //
NK015(ba)007:181: de nas dbang po'i spyan sngar dam nyams pa slar blang ste bsrung ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:182: rtsa ba yan lag gi dam tshig rnams rang gi srog la bab kyang bsrung snyam du bsam la /
NK015(ba)007:184: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya bca' la /
NK015(ba)007:185: bla med mi spangs bla ma bkur //
NK015(ba)007:186: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad //
NK015(ba)007:187: yang dag lam du zhugs la byams //
NK015(ba)007:188: gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya //
NK015(ba)007:189: gti mug chags dang zhe sdang che //
NK015(ba)007:190: nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo //
NK015(ba)007:191: dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen //
NK015(ba)007:192: dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro //
NK015(ba)007:193: bde bar gshegs pa khyed ci 'dra //
NK015(ba)007:194: de 'dra kho nar bdag gyur cig /
NK015(ba)007:195: spyod pa rmad byung bsam yas pa /
NK015(ba)007:197: / 'gro la phan pa'i don du spyad //
NK015(ba)007:198: byang chub spyod mchog dam pa dang //
NK015(ba)007:199: sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya 'di //
NK015(ba)007:200: srog gi phyir yang mi gtong na //
NK015(ba)007:201: rdo rje rgyal pos byin rlobs shig /
NK015(ba)007:203: sangs rgyas mdzad dka' bdag gis mdzad //
NK015(ba)007:204: byang chub spyad dka' bdag gis spyad //
NK015(ba)007:206: bdag cag bsam pa 'grub gyur cig /
NK015(ba)007:208: rang gi thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis dpang po'i lha
NK015(ba)007:209: rnams 'od du zhu nas bdag gi spyi bor thim
NK015(ba)007:210: par bsgom nas / sdig sgrib thams cad mar 'og sgo dang sor mo bcu nas mar bud nas /
NK015(ba)007:211: rang gi lus ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang bar bsam /
NK015(ba)007:212: badz+ra sat+wa sa ma ya sogs /
NK015(ba)007:213: zhes pas rgyun bshags rdzogs so //
NK015(ba)007:214: bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:215: rnal 'byor pas bde gshegs zhi khro yongs rdzogs kyi
NK015(ba)007:216: lha rnams mdun gyi nam mkhar nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan
NK015(ba)007:217: la dbang po'i mngon sum dang 'dra ba zhal ram
NK015(ba)007:219: mdun du rung gi lus rdul snyed du sprul nas /
NK015(ba)007:220: bshags tshig 'dis yid 'gyod sems dang bcas nas /
NK015(ba)007:221: dus thams cad du bshags par bya'o //
NK015(ba)007:222: rjes lta bas kyang bshags par bya'o //
NK015(ba)007:223: dam tshig la bsgrim pas ni dngos grub myur ro //
NK015(ba)007:224: de yang bshags pa la lnga ste /
NK015(ba)007:225: dang po dgongs su gsol ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:226: bcom ldan 'das zhi khro rab 'byams kyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:228: phyogs bcu dus bzhi kun gyi bdag nyid che //
NK015(ba)007:229: bla ma rgyal ba zhi khro yongs rdzogs dgongs /
NK015(ba)007:231: / 'dir gshegs nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs //
NK015(ba)007:232: nyams chag na rag sbyongs phyir phyag mchod bzhes //
NK015(ba)007:234: lus rdul snyed kyi mgo bos zhabs la btud de /
NK015(ba)007:235: yon tan phun tshogs bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:236: dmigs med spros bral chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:237: bde chen longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo /
NK015(ba)007:239: / 'gro mgon cir yang sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:240: gnas lugs mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:241: yang dag mngon par byang chub sku la phyag 'atsalala lo //
NK015(ba)007:242: nyon mongs zhi mdzad zhi ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:243: log lta tshar gcod khro bo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:244: thabs mgon tshe bdag 'jam dpal sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:245: skyon bral sgra sgrogs pad+ma'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:246: yang dag don ldan badz+ra'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:247: dug lnga nad sel bdud rtsi sman gyi lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:248: dregs pa 'joms mdzad phur pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo /
NK015(ba)007:250: / 'byung ba'i mnga' bdag mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:251: sa dang lam rdzogs rig 'dzin tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:252: bstan pa srung mdzad dam can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:253: dgra bgegs bdud 'dul sngags bdag rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:254: gang gis rgyal ba zhi khro yi //
NK015(ba)007:256: nyams chag ma lus kun byang ste //
NK015(ba)007:257: mtshams med lnga la smon ci dgos //
NK015(ba)007:258: na rag gnas kyang dong sprugs te //
NK015(ba)007:259: rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags //
NK015(ba)007:260: rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang sngags dngos //
NK015(ba)007:261: las sgrib nyams sgrib dag byed pa'i /
NK015(ba)007:263: / 'khor ba dong sprugs yang snying bzla //
NK015(ba)007:264: ring nyid tha mal pa'i spyi bor pad zla nyi ma gsum brtsegs kyi steng du /
NK015(ba)007:265: rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
NK015(ba)007:266: g.yon dril bu thugs kar bsnol ba /
NK015(ba)007:267: ral pa'i thor gtsug gyen du bcing cing /
NK015(ba)007:268: lhag ma thur du grol ba /
NK015(ba)007:269: rin po che'i srog zhu gsol ba /
NK015(ba)007:270: spyi bor zla ba'i steng du dkar po /
NK015(ba)007:271: mgrin par pad+ma'i steng du ahdamara po /
NK015(ba)007:272: thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga
NK015(ba)007:273: pa'i lte bar h'u dkar po dngul chu'i mdog lta
NK015(ba)007:275: yig 'bru gsum po la 'od zer byung nas /
NK015(ba)007:276: bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum la phog nas /
NK015(ba)007:277: chag nyams sdig sgrib thams cad rkang mthil sen phrag
NK015(ba)007:278: nas mar 'od nag po'i tshul du bud par bsam
NK015(ba)007:279: / rang gi lus shel phyis pa ltar dkar sangs kyis song bar bsam /
NK015(ba)007:280: gsum pa snying po bzla ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:281: dbang po rnams kyi thugs ka nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun byung nas sdig sgrib dag par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:286: tish+tha di d+h+ro me b+ha wa /
NK015(ba)007:287: su to sh+yo me b+ha wa /
NK015(ba)007:288: a nu rak+to me b+ha wa /
NK015(ba)007:292: tsit+tam sh+r+ae ya ku ru h'u /
NK015(ba)007:295: sarba ta th+aa ga ta badz+ra m+aa me muny+tsa /
NK015(ba)007:297: ma h+aa sa ma y+aa sat+wa +aa /
NK015(ba)007:298: bzhi pa bshags pa dngos ni /
NK015(ba)007:302: hoh bde gshegs yongs rdzogs dgongs su gsol //
NK015(ba)007:303: rgyal ba'i bka' dang bla ma'i lung //
NK015(ba)007:304: ci bzhin ma spyad slob dpon smad //
NK015(ba)007:305: rdo rje mched dang lcam dral la //
NK015(ba)007:306: lta log ngan sems ngag tu smras //
NK015(ba)007:307: brdeg brtsog gnod pa dngos su spyad //
NK015(ba)007:308: lha dang dkyil 'khor nyams ma gsal //
NK015(ba)007:309: dzapa bzlas ma dag zur chag nyams //
NK015(ba)007:310: gsang bar 'os dang gnyer gtad smras //
NK015(ba)007:311: gsang bcu bsgrags shing bla ma bslus //
NK015(ba)007:312: rtsa ba'i dam nyams mthol zhing bshags //
NK015(ba)007:313: spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga //
NK015(ba)007:314: shes bya lnga dang bsgrub bya lnga //
NK015(ba)007:315: mi spang lnga dang dang len lnga //
NK015(ba)007:316: yan lag dam nyams mthol zhing bshags //
NK015(ba)007:317: bsnyen sgrub ting 'dzin mi gsal zhing //
NK015(ba)007:318: nya stong dus drug mchod pa chags //
NK015(ba)007:319: le lo bsog 'jog tshogs sbyang byas //
NK015(ba)007:320: phud lhag nyams shing kha tshar shor //
NK015(ba)007:321: tshor dang ma tshor rkyen dbang gi //
NK015(ba)007:322: sgo gsum bag med dam nyams bshags //
NK015(ba)007:323: lnga pa lta bas bshags pa ni /
NK015(ba)007:324: chos thams cad ye nas gnas pa'i gnas lugs de kho na nyid rtogs shing yid la byas te /
NK015(ba)007:325: yid kyi dam nyams lta bas bshags //
NK015(ba)007:326: de yang kun gzhi byang chub sems //
NK015(ba)007:327: yin pa med pa'i lta ba rtogs //
NK015(ba)007:328: min pa med pa'i spyod pa rtogs //
NK015(ba)007:329: yin min med pa'i bsgom nyams lon //
NK015(ba)007:330: re dogs med pa'i byang chub sems //
NK015(ba)007:331: rtsa ba yan lag thams cad kyi //
NK015(ba)007:332: chag nyams ma byung ma skyes pas //
NK015(ba)007:333: bshags bya bshags byed gnyis med grol //
NK015(ba)007:334: nyams chag bshags pa'i mdo na rag dong sprugs rdzogs so //
NK015(ba)007:335: longs sku dag pa'i zhing gi man+dala 'bul ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:336: rang yi dam du mos pa'i smin mtshams nas yi
NK015(ba)007:337: ge b+h+r+aum gcig spros pas 'od du zhu ba las
NK015(ba)007:338: / rin po che'i sa gzhi mnan na nem pa /
NK015(ba)007:339: bteg na 'phar ba mig mang ris su bris pa /
NK015(ba)007:340: rgya mdo thams cad rin po che'i tshom bus spras pa /
NK015(ba)007:341: mig gis bltar mi bzod pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i
NK015(ba)007:342: dbus su rin po che'i khri seng ge brgyad kyis
NK015(ba)007:344: rin po che'i mdzod mig bdun bdun dang ldan pa /
NK015(ba)007:345: gdung ma zung sgril du 'khor ba /
NK015(ba)007:346: rin po che'i d+r+wa bas khri kheb byas pa /
NK015(ba)007:347: de'i steng du pad zla nyi ma gsum brtsegs kyi steng du /
NK015(ba)007:348: rtsa ba'i bla ma la rgyud pa'i bla ma rnams kyis bskor ba /
NK015(ba)007:349: de'i shar du glang po che brgyad kyis btegs pa'i gdan drug brtsegs kyi steng du /
NK015(ba)007:350: yi dam lha tshogs rnams la chos skyong srung mas bskor ba /
NK015(ba)007:351: g.yas su rta mchog brgyad kyis btegs pa'i gdan drug
NK015(ba)007:352: brtsegs kyi steng du sangs rgyas dkon mchog sku gsum
NK015(ba)007:353: gyis bsdus pa rnams bzhugs par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:354: rgyab tu rma bya brgyad kyis btegs pa'i gdan drug
NK015(ba)007:355: brtsegs kyi steng du chos dkon mchog rgyu 'bras lam
NK015(ba)007:356: gsum gyis bsdus pa rnams gser gyi shog gu la
NK015(ba)007:357: bee d+aur+ya zhun mas rang nan du bris pa'i glegs
NK015(ba)007:358: bam la rang sgra grags pa rnams bsam /
NK015(ba)007:359: g.yon du shang shang brgyad kyis btegs pa'i gdan drug
NK015(ba)007:360: brtsegs kyi steng du dge 'dun dkon mchog rig pa
NK015(ba)007:363: byang chub sems dpa' zag pa med pa rnams dang /
NK015(ba)007:364: 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
NK015(ba)007:365: gzhan yang sa dang lam la gnas pa rnams bsam /
NK015(ba)007:366: de dag gi mnga' ris dang spyan lam du 'dod
NK015(ba)007:367: pa'i yon tan thams cad nam mkha' la sprin bzhin
NK015(ba)007:368: du 'byung ba / bar snang la rang bzhin du 'bab pa /
NK015(ba)007:369: sa gzhi la rtsi shing bzhin du skye ba /
NK015(ba)007:370: 'dod dgu thams cad 'byung ba'i sa gzhi chos kyi khyab tshad dang mnyam pa /
NK015(ba)007:371: bla ma dkon mchog la 'bul bar bsam la /
NK015(ba)007:372: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
NK015(ba)007:373: sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis //
NK015(ba)007:374: phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing //
NK015(ba)007:375: mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi //
NK015(ba)007:376: sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi //
NK015(ba)007:377: mdzes par bres shing spras pa dang //
NK015(ba)007:379: dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil //
NK015(ba)007:380: rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //
NK015(ba)007:381: rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal //
NK015(ba)007:382: glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra //
NK015(ba)007:383: bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' bdugs //
NK015(ba)007:384: do shal dpung rgyan se mo do //
NK015(ba)007:385: bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams kyis //
NK015(ba)007:386: rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi //
NK015(ba)007:387: lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis //
NK015(ba)007:388: gro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis //
NK015(ba)007:389: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas //
NK015(ba)007:390: bla ma rnams dang dkon mchog gsum //
NK015(ba)007:392: sprul sku dag pa zhing gi man+dala 'bul ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:393: thugs ka nas tram gcig spros pa 'od du zhu ba las mtha'i rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su /
NK015(ba)007:394: dbus kyi ri bo mchog rab /
NK015(ba)007:396: lho bee d+aur+ya las grub pa /
NK015(ba)007:397: nub pad+ma r+aa ga las grub pa /
NK015(ba)007:399: steng sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i rten longs spyod /
NK015(ba)007:400: khong seng lha ma yin gyi rten longs spyod /
NK015(ba)007:402: phyi rol rgyal chen sde bzhi'i rten longs spyod /
NK015(ba)007:406: lus dang lus 'phags po dang bcas pa /
NK015(ba)007:408: rnga yab dang rnga yab gzhan /
NK015(ba)007:412: sgra mi snyan dang sgra mi snyan gyi zla /
NK015(ba)007:414: snang gsal gyi nyi zla gza' skar /
NK015(ba)007:415: mtha' yi lcags ri mu khyud /
NK015(ba)007:416: nam mkhas khyab tshad kyi 'jig rten lha dang mi'i
NK015(ba)007:417: longs spyod thams cad bla ma dkon mchog gsum la
NK015(ba)007:418: 'bul bar bsam / gling bzhi dkyil 'khor rin chen ldan //
NK015(ba)007:419: dpag bsam shing dang rding bus mdzes //
NK015(ba)007:420: las gzhi'i byin rlabs khyad par las //
NK015(ba)007:421: lha dang lha mo'i longs spyod ldan //
NK015(ba)007:422: lhag pa'i ting 'dzin mchod pa bzhes //
NK015(ba)007:423: chos rnams thams cad 'bras bu yongs rdzogs shing //
NK015(ba)007:424: sangs rgyas rnams la man+dala 'di 'bul bas /
NK015(ba)007:426: / 'bras bu 'phags pa'i nor bdun lhun grub ste //
NK015(ba)007:427: ting 'dzin 'bum phrag rnams la dbang bsgyur shog /
NK015(ba)007:428: gsol ba btab pa'i man+dala 'bul ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:430: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
NK015(ba)007:435: zhing khams zag pa med pa /
NK015(ba)007:436: zad mi shes pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i bden pa dang /
NK015(ba)007:440: brgyud pa'i bla ma rje btsun rin po che rnams
NK015(ba)007:441: kyi byin rlabs kyis bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas
NK015(ba)007:442: / ma sems can thams cad kyi don du rdzogs pa chen po shin tu rnal 'byor /
NK015(ba)007:443: don rang byung gi ye shes de kho na nyid kyi don gyis gang ba dang /
NK015(ba)007:450: shin tu grol ba rgya chen po mdzad du gsol /
NK015(ba)007:451: badz+ra sat+wa sa ma ya sogs tshar bar brjod /
NK015(ba)007:452: bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di bgyi bas /
NK015(ba)007:454: / 'jig rten ring por mi thog sangs rgyas nas //
NK015(ba)007:455: de kun 'gro la phan phyir dam chos kyi //
NK015(ba)007:456: sems can sdug bsngal mang gdung sgrol gyur cig /
NK015(ba)007:459: bdag gzhan nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad /
NK015(ba)007:460: rtsa ba dang rgyud par bcas pa'i dpal ldan bla ma dam pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs /
NK015(ba)007:461: skyabs su mchi'o byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol /
NK015(ba)007:462: sangs rgyas la chos la dge 'dun la rgyal ba
NK015(ba)007:463: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams
NK015(ba)007:464: la 'bar ba khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi
NK015(ba)007:465: dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams la phrin las kyi mnga'
NK015(ba)007:466: bdag dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i lha tshogs yi
NK015(ba)007:467: dam rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams la
NK015(ba)007:468: dpal ldan lha mo nag mo rang byung gi rgyal
NK015(ba)007:469: mo 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma gsang ba
NK015(ba)007:470: las chen mo rdo rje re ma ti la sogs
NK015(ba)007:471: pa'i 'khor ma gshin rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas pa
NK015(ba)007:472: rnams la dpal ldan mgon po nag po /
NK015(ba)007:474: sh+r+ai ma h+aa ka la dam pa ye shes pa'i
NK015(ba)007:475: chos skyong ba'i srung ma rnams la gzhan yang pha
NK015(ba)007:477: slob dpon rgyud kyi srung ma /
NK015(ba)007:478: las dang skal bar ldan pa'i chos skyong srung ma rnams la gsol ba 'debs /
NK015(ba)007:480: byin gyis brlabs par mdzad du gsol //
NK015(ba)007:481: skabs 'dir dkar gtor gzhung gang rung gis byin gyis brlabs la bsngo /
NK015(ba)007:482: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:483: sems can thams cad kyi bar chad bsal nas rdzogs
NK015(ba)007:484: pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i ched du bdag gis bsrung
NK015(ba)007:485: 'khor bsgom zhing mtshams bcad par bya'o snyam du bsam
NK015(ba)007:486: la / skad cig gis stong pa'i ngang las /
NK015(ba)007:487: rang nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog sngo nag g.yas rdo rje /
NK015(ba)007:489: zhal 'dzum yang mche ba yud tsam gcig pa /
NK015(ba)007:490: spyan gsum zhi ba yin kyang sdang mig tu gzigs pa /
NK015(ba)007:491: sku 'od phung gi nang na bzhugs kyang 'od kyi rtse mo la me ri 'phro ba /
NK015(ba)007:492: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yum dbyings phyug ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa /
NK015(ba)007:494: g.yon dril bu yab kyi snyan rtsar dkrol ba /
NK015(ba)007:495: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i gdan la rang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' /
NK015(ba)007:496: de'i thugs kar rdo rje'i lte bar h'u las h'u badz+ra d+h+riga gis bskor ba /
NK015(ba)007:497: yum gyi thugs kar dril bu la m+aumhd+ha tu shwa ris bskor ba /
NK015(ba)007:498: spyi bor 'khor lo la dkar po /
NK015(ba)007:500: thugs kar nyi ma la h'u sngon po de dang
NK015(ba)007:501: dus mnyam du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
NK015(ba)007:502: cad kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i skur gyur te /
NK015(ba)007:503: de dag gi spyi bor nas 'od zer dkar po /
NK015(ba)007:505: thugs ka nas 'od zer sngon po byung ste rang la bstim mo //
NK015(ba)007:507: lha tshogs rnams kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje'i char byung bas /
NK015(ba)007:508: dgra bgegs rnams kyi sems brgyal zhing lus dum bur bcad par bsam la /
NK015(ba)007:509: de bzhin du spyi bo nas 'khor lo'i char /
NK015(ba)007:510: mgrin pa nas tho ba'i char /
NK015(ba)007:511: lte ba nas ral gri'i char /
NK015(ba)007:512: gsang gnas nas rgya gram gyi char /
NK015(ba)007:513: sku thams cad las brag ri'i char byung bas /
NK015(ba)007:514: bgegs rnams brgyal zhing lus dum bur bcad par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:515: de nas mtshon cha'i char de dag la rdo rje'i
NK015(ba)007:516: gur la sogs pa gur rim pa drug tu gyur
NK015(ba)007:517: to // de'i phyi rol du rdo rje rgya gram gyi rang bzhin gyur te /
NK015(ba)007:522: dbus mthing ga'i nang du tshud par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:523: de nas bgegs brgyal ba rnams thugs rje'i 'od zer dang sngags kyi slar bslang ste /
NK015(ba)007:526: byams pa dang ldan par byas te /
NK015(ba)007:527: 'jig rten gzhan du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bsam /
NK015(ba)007:528: h'u rnal 'byor chen po zhes pa nas /
NK015(ba)007:529: rang gi mig g.yas pa ma las nyi ma /
NK015(ba)007:530: g.yon pa a las zla ba /
NK015(ba)007:531: de nas mig g.yas pas g.yas bskor du bltas pas gar mthong ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren bsreg pa /
NK015(ba)007:532: g.yon pas g.yon bskor du bltas pas thal ba yang ma lus pa bkrus pa /
NK015(ba)007:533: mig dbus mas thad kar bltas pas de nyid byang
NK015(ba)007:534: chub sems thams cad gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
NK015(ba)007:535: kyi rang bzhin du gnas par bsam nas /
NK015(ba)007:544: 'di gsung ba tsam gyis phyogs bcu nas mtshon cha'i char chen 'bab par gyur te /
NK015(ba)007:545: bgegs rnams brgyal zhing lus dum bu bcad par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:546: thugs rjes slar bslang sngags 'di bzlas /
NK015(ba)007:547: badz+ra sat+wa ra tsa dza srung 'khor phub cing dam tshig bsgrags /
NK015(ba)007:549: gsang ba'i dam can so so nas /
NK015(ba)007:551: / 'du ba la ni ma gtogs shing //
NK015(ba)007:552: nyan pa la ni mi dbang ba //
NK015(ba)007:553: kun kyang re ba bskongs lags kyis //
NK015(ba)007:554: da lta nyid du so sor dengs //
NK015(ba)007:555: h'u ci ste bka' las 'das gyur na //
NK015(ba)007:556: rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas ni //
NK015(ba)007:557: rdo rje mtshon chen 'bar ba yis //
NK015(ba)007:558: thal ba bzhin du brlag par byed //
NK015(ba)007:562: h+aum nga yi dkyil 'khor brten bya'i phyir //
NK015(ba)007:563: khro rgyal byin rlabs las byung ba'i //
NK015(ba)007:564: mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
NK015(ba)007:565: dkyil 'khor rim pa tshul bzhin bsrung //
NK015(ba)007:566: h+aum steng yang rdo rje'i bla re la //
NK015(ba)007:567: rdo rje'i tho thog ser chen 'bebs /
NK015(ba)007:569: / 'og kyang rdo rje'i sa gzhi la //
NK015(ba)007:570: rdo rje'i tsh+wa tsh+wa skar ltar 'khrug /
NK015(ba)007:571: phyogs mtshams kun kyang rdo rje 'bar bas gtams //
NK015(ba)007:572: rlung yang 'gyu ba'i skabs med na //
NK015(ba)007:573: bgegs kyi tshogs lta ga la srid //
NK015(ba)007:574: badz+ra dz+wa la la ska kro ta h'u phata /
NK015(ba)007:575: h'u steng yang 'khor lo'i bla re la /
NK015(ba)007:582: phyogs mtshams kun kyang 'khor los gtams //
NK015(ba)007:583: rlung yang 'gyu ba'i skabs med na //
NK015(ba)007:584: bgegs kyi tshogs lta ga la srid //
NK015(ba)007:585: badz+ra tsakra dz+wa la la ska kro ta h'u phata /
NK015(ba)007:586: h'u steng yang ral gri'i bla re la //
NK015(ba)007:587: ral gri'i tho thog ser chen 'bebs /
NK015(ba)007:589: / 'og kyang ral gri'i sa gzhi la //
NK015(ba)007:590: ral gri'i tsh+wa tsh+wa skar ltar 'khrug /
NK015(ba)007:591: phyogs mtshams ral gri 'bar bas gtams //
NK015(ba)007:592: rlung yang 'gyu ba'i skabs med na //
NK015(ba)007:593: bgegs kyi tshogs lta ga la srid //
NK015(ba)007:594: badz+ra prany+tsa dz+wa la la ska kro ta h'u phata /
NK015(ba)007:595: h'u steng yang tho ba'i bla re la //
NK015(ba)007:596: tho ba'i tho thog ser chen 'bebs /
NK015(ba)007:598: / 'og kyang tho ba'i sa gzhi la //
NK015(ba)007:599: tho ba'i tsh+wa tsh+wa skar ltar 'khrug /
NK015(ba)007:600: phyogs mtshams kun kyang tho bas gtams //
NK015(ba)007:601: rlung yang 'gyu ba'i skabs med na //
NK015(ba)007:602: bgegs kyi tshogs lta ga la srid //
NK015(ba)007:603: badz+ra musti dz+wa la la ska kro ta h'u phata /
NK015(ba)007:604: h'u steng yang rgya gram bla re la //
NK015(ba)007:605: rgya gram tho thog ser chen 'abebaba /
NK015(ba)007:607: / 'og kyang rgya gram sa gzhi la //
NK015(ba)007:608: rgya gram tsh+wa tsh+wa skar ltar 'khrug /
NK015(ba)007:609: phyogs mtshams kun kyang rgya gram 'bar bas gtams //
NK015(ba)007:610: rlung yang 'gyu ba'i skabs med na //
NK015(ba)007:611: bgegs kyi tshogs lta ga la srid //
NK015(ba)007:612: badz+ra karma dz+wa la la ska kro ta h'u phata /
NK015(ba)007:613: h'u steng yang brag ri'i bla re la //
NK015(ba)007:614: brag ri'i tho thog ser chen 'bebs /
NK015(ba)007:616: / 'og kyang brag ri'i sa gzhi la //
NK015(ba)007:617: brag ri'i tsh+wa tsh+wa skar ltar 'khrug /
NK015(ba)007:618: phyogs mtshams kun kyang brag ris gtams //
NK015(ba)007:619: rlung yang 'gyu ba'i skabs med na //
NK015(ba)007:620: bgegs kyi tshogs lta ga la srid //
NK015(ba)007:621: badz+ra pa ta la pany+tsa h'u phata /
NK015(ba)007:622: bsang chu byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
NK015(ba)007:623: rang gi thugs ka nas ram yam kham gsum spros
NK015(ba)007:624: pas mchod pa rnams kyi dngos po ma dag pa
NK015(ba)007:625: thams cad me chu rlung gsum gyis bsreg gtor bkrus
NK015(ba)007:626: nas ram yam kham gsum rang gi thugs kar tshur
NK015(ba)007:628: b+han+d+ha'i nang du a mri ta ga bur la sogs sman btab pa'am chu gtsang ma btsal te /
NK015(ba)007:631: de'i nang du +aah las zla ba'i steng du mumhls yum kro ti shwa ri ma /
NK015(ba)007:632: sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa rdo
NK015(ba)007:633: rje dang dril bu bsnams pa dpal gyi chas brgyad
NK015(ba)007:635: de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du b+han+d+ha mum gyis mtshan par bsgom /
NK015(ba)007:636: badz+ra d+ha du kro d+hi shwa ri de wi shwa d+ha ni sta na dz+ny+aa na h'u h+aum h+aum /
NK015(ba)007:638: dbyings phyug ma 'od du zhu ba las chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gyur cing /
NK015(ba)007:640: mchod rdzas rnams mi dmigs pa las mchod pa'i lha mo dkar ser dmar ljang rnams kyis /
NK015(ba)007:646: rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan shangs thugs ka sku lus la thim par bsam la /
NK015(ba)007:652: badz+ra nee wi t+ya +aahmh'u s+w+aa h+aa /
NK015(ba)007:654: sman byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
NK015(ba)007:657: b+han+d+ha ka p+aa la yangs shing rgya che ba /
NK015(ba)007:658: phyi rin po che lnga las grub pa /
NK015(ba)007:660: mu tig dkar po dri ma med pa lta bu /
NK015(ba)007:661: thig bzhi btab pas ril cha dgu dang ldan pa gyur par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:664: lhor rin po che zur brgyad /
NK015(ba)007:667: dbus su nyi ma'i steng du byang sems la h'u dang m+aumh shar du dri chen la dang l+aam /
NK015(ba)007:668: lhor sha chen la s+w+aa dang m+aam /
NK015(ba)007:669: nub tu pad+ma rak+ta la +amo dang pyam /
NK015(ba)007:670: byang du dri chu la h+aa dang t+aamh de las 'od zer 'phros pas /
NK015(ba)007:671: 'khor 'das thams cad kyi bcud bsdus nas slar thim pa las /
NK015(ba)007:672: rigs lnga yab yum bcur gyur te /
NK015(ba)007:673: dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum dkar /
NK015(ba)007:674: shar du rnam par snang mdzad yab yum ser po /
NK015(ba)007:675: lhor rin 'byung yab yum sngon po /
NK015(ba)007:676: nub tu snang mtha' yab yum dmar po /
NK015(ba)007:677: byang du don yod grub pa yab yum ljang khu /
NK015(ba)007:678: rang gi mtheb srin gnyis rta mgrin yab yum sku
NK015(ba)007:679: mdog dmar po g.yas lcags kyu dang g.yon sdigs mdzub
NK015(ba)007:680: can du bsgom / de nas rang yi dam gyi
NK015(ba)007:681: yab yum mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs la rol pa
NK015(ba)007:682: mdzad pa'i byang chub sems kyi 'od zer rta mgrin
NK015(ba)007:684: rta mgrin yab yum rol pa mdzad pa'i byang chub
NK015(ba)007:685: sems kyi 'od zer rigs lnga yab yum bcu la
NK015(ba)007:686: phog / rigs lnga yab yum bcu rol pa mdzad
NK015(ba)007:687: pa'i byang chub sems kyi 'od zer phyogs bcu'i sangs
NK015(ba)007:688: phog / rgyas la phog / de dag rol pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dang /
NK015(ba)007:689: thugs chos nyid kyi bdud rtsi tshur 'dus pas rigs lnga yab yum bcu la thim par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:700: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+aihth+aa /
NK015(ba)007:701: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad dam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bdun brjod do //
NK015(ba)007:703: rigs lnga yab yum bcu rol pa mdzad pas thams cad 'od du zhu nas /
NK015(ba)007:704: bdud rtsi kha dog dkar la dmar ba'i mdangs chags pa /
NK015(ba)007:705: mu tig dkar po dri ma med pa lta bus b+han d+ha phyur gyis gang bar bsgom /
NK015(ba)007:706: de nas rdo rjes dkrugs pas /
NK015(ba)007:707: sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud bskul bar bsgom /
NK015(ba)007:708: +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+aihth+aa /
NK015(ba)007:709: zhes mtheb srin nyi zla'i skyog tu bsam la /
NK015(ba)007:710: de bazhinagashegasa pa rnams la gtor /
NK015(ba)007:711: rdo rje sems dpa' srin lag gis 'khyor ba gang
NK015(ba)007:712: phyogs bcur gtor bas bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu
NK015(ba)007:713: la phog / lus sems sgyu ma rdul du brlag par bsam la /
NK015(ba)007:714: gang zhig bka' rku ba dang /
NK015(ba)007:716: blta ba dang nyan pa la mi dbang ba'i snod
NK015(ba)007:717: ma yin pa'i bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu po
NK015(ba)007:718: de dag la nga'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chu
NK015(ba)007:720: lus srog sgyu ma rdul du brlag nas thams cad kyang med par byos shig /
NK015(ba)007:721: gang zhig dam tshig dang ldan pa rnams kyi thugs dam bskong bar mdzod cig /
NK015(ba)007:722: rigs can rnams kyi dam tshig ni /
NK015(ba)007:723: rigs med rnams la dbab mi 'gyur //
NK015(ba)007:724: rigs can rang gi dam tshig las //
NK015(ba)007:725: sangs rgyas kun kyang 'da' ba min //
NK015(ba)007:726: ces rang gi sngags gong ma brjod cing lce la lan gsum blang ngo //
NK015(ba)007:728: w+aak+ka badz+ra +aah tsit+ta badz+ra h'u gnas gsum du gtug go //
NK015(ba)007:730: rak+ta byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
NK015(ba)007:731: rang gi thugs ka nas b+h+rum gcig spros pa las /
NK015(ba)007:732: ka p+aa la yangs shing rgya che ba gcig bsgom /
NK015(ba)007:733: de'i nang rak+tasa gang bar bsgom /
NK015(ba)007:734: de nas bdag gi thugs ka nas ram spros me dpung du gyur te /
NK015(ba)007:735: tha mal pa'i rak+ta rnams bsreg cing med par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:736: de nas yang rang gi thugs ka nas ra dmar po gcig spros pa las /
NK015(ba)007:737: b+han+d+ha'i nang du khrag gi rgya mtshor gyur te /
NK015(ba)007:738: khrag sbu ri rab tsam chags pa las zhing gi
NK015(ba)007:739: snyas 'phyo ba 'od zer dpag tu med par 'phro
NK015(ba)007:740: bar bsgom ma h+aa rak+ta dz+wa la man+da la h'u
NK015(ba)007:741: h'u h'u phata / ces pas de bzhin gshegs pa
NK015(ba)007:742: rnams la gtor bas sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud mnyes
NK015(ba)007:744: chos skyong rnams la gtor bas thugs dam bskang bar bsam /
NK015(ba)007:745: bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu la phog pas lus rdul du brlag par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:746: rang gi lce la lan gsum blangs /
NK015(ba)007:747: snying gar rak+ta'i thig le zla gam gcig bya'o //
NK015(ba)007:749: gtor ma byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK015(ba)007:750: rang gi thugs ka nas b+h+r+aum gcig spros pa las /
NK015(ba)007:751: b+han+d+ha'i gzhal yas khang phyi rin po che sna lnga las grub pa /
NK015(ba)007:752: nang mu tig dkar po dri ma med pa lta bu /
NK015(ba)007:753: thig bzhi btub pas ril tshad gu dang ldan par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:754: de'i dbus su byang sems la h'u /
NK015(ba)007:755: de'i rtsar mi ro la m+aum /
NK015(ba)007:759: byang du dri chu la h+aa /
NK015(ba)007:760: shar lho glang po che'i ro la l+aam /
NK015(ba)007:761: lho nub tu rta ro la m+aam /
NK015(ba)007:762: nub byang du rma bya'i ro la p+y+aam /
NK015(ba)007:763: byang shar du khyi ro la t+aam /
NK015(ba)007:764: rang gi thugs ka nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor h'u gi mtshan pa spros /
NK015(ba)007:765: dngos po ma dag pa thams cad bsreg nas /
NK015(ba)007:766: bcud yig 'bru bcu la thim par bsgom /
NK015(ba)007:768: de dag thams cad bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor gyur par bsam /
NK015(ba)007:769: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis mtshan pa spros /
NK015(ba)007:770: bdud rtsi'i steng du gnas pa las /
NK015(ba)007:771: las 'dod pa'i yon tan khams drug gi lha mo dpag tu med pa spro zhing /
NK015(ba)007:772: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod /
NK015(ba)007:773: +aahmh'u ma h+aa b+ha ling+ta te dz+wa b+ha ling+ta ta
NK015(ba)007:774: b+ha la b+ha ti gu h+ya sa ma ye s+w+aa
NK015(ba)007:775: h+aa / zhes brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
NK015(ba)007:778: rgyun gtor bskyong dus yig 'bru gsum tshur bsdu /
NK015(ba)007:779: gzugs kyi lha mo dkar mos phyag na me long bsnams pa dang /
NK015(ba)007:780: sgra'i lha mo sngon mos phyag na pi wam bsnams pa dang /
NK015(ba)007:781: dri'i lha mo ser mos phyag na spos khang bsnams pa /
NK015(ba)007:782: ro'i lha mo dmar mos phyag nas zhal zas ro mchog brgya dang ldan pa bsnams pa /
NK015(ba)007:783: reg bya'i lha mo ljang gus phyag na na baza'i gong ba rdo rjes mtshan pa bsnams pa /
NK015(ba)007:784: chos kyi lha mo mthing kas e gru gsum bsnams pa /
NK015(ba)007:785: mchod pa'i bye brag de rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan dang snyan dang shangs dang /
NK015(ba)007:787: sku dang thugs kar thim par bsgom /
NK015(ba)007:788: de ni nang gi phyi'i mchod pa'o //
NK015(ba)007:789: gtor ma bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor gyur pa de dag la /
NK015(ba)007:790: lha rnams kyi ljags rdo rje'i sbu bur gyur nas
NK015(ba)007:791: chu la nyi zer phog pa bzhin du gsol bar
NK015(ba)007:792: bsam pa ni / phyi'i nang gi mchod pa'o //
NK015(ba)007:793: yang de nyid sha khrag rus pa'i tshogs su gyur
NK015(ba)007:794: nas brjid pa'i tshul du gsol bar bsam pa ni
NK015(ba)007:795: / dug gsum gnas su dag pa'i mchod pa zhes kyang bya /
NK015(ba)007:796: nang gi gsang ba'i mchod pa zhes kyang bya /
NK015(ba)007:797: khams gsum yongs sgrol gyi mchod pa zhes kyang bya /
NK015(ba)007:798: dkyil 'khor gong 'og sngags phyi nang ci ltar na'ang gtor ma gcig la bsten pas chog /
NK015(ba)007:799: byin rlabs kyang lan gcig byas la /
NK015(ba)007:800: nam mchod pa'i dus su +aahmh'u gis bsar la gsal bar byas la mchod do //
NK015(ba)007:802: de nas bshags pa gsol ba ni /
NK015(ba)007:803: rang yi dam lhar gsal ba'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom /
NK015(ba)007:804: de'i thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom /
NK015(ba)007:805: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bca' la rang gi spyi gtsug nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la yi dam /
NK015(ba)007:806: de'i dbu la zla ba'i gdan la bla ma /
NK015(ba)007:807: g.yas su zhi ba'i lha tshogs /
NK015(ba)007:808: g.yon du khro bo'i lha tshogs chos skyong bsrung ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyis bskor ba dang /
NK015(ba)007:809: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad mdun gyi nam mkha'
NK015(ba)007:810: la bsdus te chos kyi sku la gzugs kyi skur
NK015(ba)007:812: badz+ra sa ma na dza h'u dza badz+ra ar+g+ham pra ti dza +aahmh'u /
NK015(ba)007:813: d+hu pe push+pe +aa lo ke gan+d+he bee w+ai t+y+aa shab+ta pra tits+tsha +aahmh'u /
NK015(ba)007:815: srin lag rtse sprad la 'di skad do //
NK015(ba)007:816: ye shes sku mchog rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni //
NK015(ba)007:817: zla rgyas lta bur spros pa mi mnga' yang //
NK015(ba)007:818: thugs rje nyi shar bzhin du snyoms mdzad pa'i /
NK015(ba)007:820: / 'dir gshegs bdag la dgongs shing bzhugs su gsol //
NK015(ba)007:821: h'u brjod med shes rab mi g.yo chos kyi dbyings //
NK015(ba)007:822: bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku rigs lnga'i gtso //
NK015(ba)007:823: thugs rje thabs mkhas rgya che rol pa yi //
NK015(ba)007:824: zhi khro sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)007:825: dngos su 'byor dang yid kyis mngon sprul te //
NK015(ba)007:826: kun tu bzang po bla med mchod sprin gyis //
NK015(ba)007:827: mkha' dbyings rnam dag rgya chen yongs bkod de //
NK015(ba)007:828: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya mtshos mchod //
NK015(ba)007:829: kun tu bzang mo yum gyi b+ha ga las //
NK015(ba)007:830: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus rab 'byams kun /
NK015(ba)007:832: / 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings su ro gcig phyir //
NK015(ba)007:833: gnyis med byang chub sems kyis mnyes gyur cig /
NK015(ba)007:834: sems kyi rang bzhin chos dbyings nam mkha' che //
NK015(ba)007:835: chos rnams ye nas rnam dag 'od gsal zhing //
NK015(ba)007:836: rnal 'byor mnyam nyid smra bsam las 'das pa //
NK015(ba)007:837: gnyis med byang chub sems la rtag tu 'dud //
NK015(ba)007:838: kun bzang rdzogs chen ye nas gdal ba yi //
NK015(ba)007:839: phyi nang gsang ba bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir //
NK015(ba)007:840: snang srid rnam dag lha dang lha mo'i dbyings /
NK015(ba)007:842: / 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yab yum lhun rdzogs rnams //
NK015(ba)007:843: gsang chen rab dgyes gzungs chen bdag nyid ma //
NK015(ba)007:844: mkha' dbyings klongs yang pad+mora 'khyil ba yi //
NK015(ba)007:845: ma bcos spros med byang chub snying po'i sku //
NK015(ba)007:846: cir yang snang ba bde chen g.yung drung lha //
NK015(ba)007:847: gnyis med thig le chen por 'od gsal zhing /
NK015(ba)007:850: bdag nyid chen po rigs lnga yab yum dang //
NK015(ba)007:851: byang chub lcam dral khro bo khro mo'i tshogs //
NK015(ba)007:852: rdo rje lha mo tshogs rje tshogs kyi bdag /
NK015(ba)007:853: rigs lnga dpal chen khro rgyal yab yum bcu //
NK015(ba)007:854: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya sgo ma bzhi //
NK015(ba)007:855: ye shes sprul pa'i tshogs chen mang po dang //
NK015(ba)007:856: ma ltar byams shing sring ltar gdung la sogs //
NK015(ba)007:857: legs nyes stangs 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod cing //
NK015(ba)007:858: bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub pa'i grogs mdzad ma //
NK015(ba)007:859: phyi nang mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs //
NK015(ba)007:860: dpang gyur rdo rje dam can dgongs su gsol //
NK015(ba)007:861: rgyal ba'i gdung tshob rdo rje ch+gee mos /
NK015(ba)007:863: / 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub sems bskyed nas //
NK015(ba)007:864: bla med byang chub go 'phang bsgrod pa'i phyir //
NK015(ba)007:865: bstan pa rgya mtsho so so'i 'dul khrims dang //
NK015(ba)007:866: sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor sdom pa'i mchog /
NK015(ba)007:867: rdo rje 'da' dka' dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer //
NK015(ba)007:868: spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig las //
NK015(ba)007:869: snga phyi mnos shing gnyer gtad smras so 'tshal //
NK015(ba)007:870: ring du mi gtong 'da' bar mi bgyid cing //
NK015(ba)007:871: don la 'gol zhing ldog sems ma mchis kyang //
NK015(ba)007:872: gdod bya long yod snyams pa'i le lo yis //
NK015(ba)007:873: klong du ma gyur rtsal shugs chung ba dang //
NK015(ba)007:874: shes bzhin mi ldan bag med dbang gyur te //
NK015(ba)007:875: bsgom la mi brtson bsnyen sgrub g.yel la sogs //
NK015(ba)007:876: tshor dang ma tshor ma rig dbang gis na //
NK015(ba)007:877: ston pa'i bka' dang dam las 'gal gyur te //
NK015(ba)007:878: rnal 'byor gang zhig dam tshig nyams pa dang //
NK015(ba)007:879: skad cig tsam yang 'phrad smra mi bya zhing //
NK015(ba)007:880: lung pa gcig gi chu la mi 'thung zhes //
NK015(ba)007:881: bka' las byung ba de ltar ma lcogs te //
NK015(ba)007:882: gsang sgo 'chol bas dbye bsal dka' ba dang //
NK015(ba)007:883: mngon shes chung bas skyon can ma rtogs te //
NK015(ba)007:884: nyams dang tshogs 'dres nyams pa bskang ba dang //
NK015(ba)007:885: nyams dang snod med rnams la chos bshad dang //
NK015(ba)007:886: nyams la mi 'dzem nyams pa'i skyon la sogs //
NK015(ba)007:887: nyams dang 'grogs shing nyams pa de dag gis //
NK015(ba)007:888: nyams sgrib skyon gyis gos par gyur to 'tshal //
NK015(ba)007:889: tshe 'di'i rkyen dang yun gyi sgrib pa rnams //
NK015(ba)007:890: rang gnong 'gyod pa'i sems kyis mthol bshags na //
NK015(ba)007:891: byams pa'i thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang //
NK015(ba)007:892: ga nyis med mi 'gyur dbyings la bdag bkod de //
NK015(ba)007:893: mi dmigs btang snyoms ngang du bzhes nas kyang //
NK015(ba)007:894: gnyis med don gyi tshangs pa stsal du gsol //
NK015(ba)007:895: don dam gnyis med spros las 'das pa las //
NK015(ba)007:896: rnam rtog gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur te //
NK015(ba)007:897: kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam gyis dbang gi na //
NK015(ba)007:898: sdig pa ci bgyis rang gnong bzod par gsol //
NK015(ba)007:899: mthol lo bshags so dam can gnyan gyi tshogs //
NK015(ba)007:900: gnong ngo 'gyod do dam can gnyan gyi tshogs //
NK015(ba)007:901: sbyang ngo bsal lo dam can gnyan gyi tshogs //
NK015(ba)007:902: nongs pa mchis na mi 'chab bzod par gsol //
NK015(ba)007:903: bzod par bzhes nas tshangs pa stsal du gsol //
NK015(ba)007:904: badz+ra sa t+wa sa ma y+aa /
NK015(ba)007:906: badz+ra sa t+wa zhes tshang bar brjod /
NK015(ba)007:907: gnubs sangs rgyas rin po ches mdzad pa rdzogs so //
